casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jonathan Douglas RICHARDSON. No. 272A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2016. David Weiss, Durham, for Richardson, Jonathan Douglas. Gregory Butler, Assistant District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Paul Jackson, Assistant District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of April 2016 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of April 2016."

Court reporter shall have up to and including the 7th day of June 2016 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel.
